overview:
Mr. Horn is responsible for all operational matters at the Group. He also participates in business development across all product lines, with a special focus on the CIS markets, Scandinavia and Germany.

Prior to joining Renaissance Capital, Mr. Horn was Managing Partner of Ernst & Young’s Russia and CIS operations and a member of the firm’s Global Council from 2002 to 2005. Mr. Horn came to Moscow in 1990 to establish Arthur Andersen’s Russian practice. For fifteen years, he was the leader of a fast-growing audit and advisory firm and successfully implemented the integration of Ernst & Young’s and Andersen’s CIS practices in 2005. Mr. Horn has been a frequent advisor to the government, ministries and regional authorities of Russia and other CIS countries.

Mr. Horn is a Diplom Kaufmann graduate of the University of Mannheim and a State Authorized Public Accountant from Norway. He has served as Chairman of the Norwegian Association of MBA Graduates, is a founding member of the German Chamber of Commerce in Russia and was President of Junior Achievement Russia.
